entry.title: Say something
entry.content: Welcome to my first blog! Brief Introduction In this simple blog, I'll show you sth about us. One Mood 我一生渴望被人收藏好 ，细心安放，妥善保管，免我惊，免我苦，免我颠沛流离，免我无枝可依，但我知，我一直知，那人他永不会来。 from《时有女子》 Last To SayThanks for all my friends' help, without which I can't make it or move on.
